name: Brainvita Peg Solitaire <-->
description:
Please Note: This app is free, no IAP, cool gameplay and optimized user interaction.

It is an addictive board game(also known as Solo Noble) for one player involving movement of marbles on a board with holes. It involves moving marbles to empty position as per the rule to have as few as possible marbles at the end.

The rule for moving a marble is to move it vertically or horizontally to an empty position which is 2 positions away, jumping over a non-empty position. The marble at the jumped position is removed from the board. In this way reducing the number of marbles on the board with each move. Diagonal moves are only allowed on the European board.

Tap once to select a marble, tap again to select an empty hole. Marbles which are jumped over are automatically removed from the board. There are three difficulty levels - Easy (unlimited), Medium (3), Hard (0).

Features include :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* Unlimited Levels
* 3 difficult levels (Easy - Hard)
* 6 Board Type
* Timer for every game
* ALL BOARDS UNLOCKED
* Hint system
* Undo system
* No IAP, free and much more......

Let's see how good you are in calculating moves to achieve your target. Enjoy...)
